Review.Titre: It is a decent app but expensive to…
Review.Contenu: It is a decent app but expensive to use, and sometimes lines get crossed and you can hear other callers in the background or obvious strangers answer calls. I recommend that BR offer month-to-month plans to customers and send a reminder to pay. I don't like automatic refill because it seems to debit money from bank every day or every other day. I also recommend a quicker notification during calls to inform that only 2 or 3 minutes are left before call disconnects. With that courtesy notification, customers would have time to add balance before calls abruptly cut off. I have had very important calls cut off because I did not realize my balance had declined to zero. Usually only a short, maybe a few seconds notice, is given before call drops. Sometimes no notice at all comes before call drops. Thanks for your attention.
